useCase.name: Turn off Buzzer and LED
useCase.description: User presses a button to turn off the buzzer and LED.

preconditions.precondition: The buzzer and LED are currently on.

mainSequence.step: Korisnik presses a button on the device.
Mikrokontroler receives the button press signal.
Mikrokontroler sends a signal to turn off the buzzer.
Mikrokontroler sends a signal to turn off the LED.
